Gaara encases himself in a huge amount of [[sand]], thus creating a giant clone of himself out of sand that will do everything that the engulfed Gaara does. The giant Gaara holds the opponent down and implodes, crushing them. The implosion is so great that it sends a shock wave through the battlefield.
